The '''Geoculus''' is an Adventure Item that can be found scattered across [[Liyue]]. Geoculi can be offered to any [[Statue of The Seven]] in Liyue for rewards. Geoculi can only be found in the overworld, and will not appear in [[chests]]. Geoculi are also limited and do not respawn.

When an overworld Geoculus is within close proximity of a player, an icon will appear on their minimap along with a sound effect. Players can also use a [[Geoculus Resonance Stone]] to be directed to the location of nearby Geoculi.

131 Geoculi can be found in the overworld, allowing a player to fully level up the Statues of The Seven in Liyue with one Geoculus to spare.
